name: Penasulia
startIntroPart1: Pardon me for poor choice of words, we come in peace.
startIntroPart2: Chia to nuta dae amigo dei camita! I am Naomi the Pious, princess of Gamou house, very pleased to collaborate with you!
declaringWar: We come to civilize you, please do not resist!
attacked: There is no surprise, this day would have came earlier.
defeated: Nobody is innocent, this is fair to us, GG.
introduction: Pardon me for poor choice of words, we come in peace.
neutralLetsHearIt: Wanna cup o tea mr ambassador?
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Bon voyage me old cream cracker!
uniques: [+2 Culture] from every specialist [in all cities]
May buy items in puppet cities

name: Thiae
startIntroPart2: Who are we? We dont remember, everything we know is wrath. Reclaim our honor!
defeated: We were just misunderstood and stuck in forever wrath, we will rise again from the ashes, you owe us your head!
introduction: The First Generation of Old World hyper power has been risen from the ashes, prepare to dead!
tradeRequest: At least we dont want your blood this time.
